definition: to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
paragraph/section/segment/stage (of a process)/classifier for stories, periods of time, lengths of thread etc

sentences.english: Drinks Station will be located at Run Course and Event Center.
sentences.chinese: 大会将于跑步赛段及赛事中心设置水站。

sentences.english: The first leg of the Tour de France bicycle race began on the French island of Corsica today.
sentences.chinese: 今天，环法自行车比赛第一赛段从法属科西嘉岛开始。

sentences.english: He can win without winning even one of the stages.
sentences.chinese: 即使他没有在任何一个赛段赢过，他也能获胜。

sentences.english: What was the condition of the road like on the section where Ogier crashed?
sentences.chinese: 那么奥吉尔发生车祸的赛段是怎样的一条赛道？

sentences.english: Your race number must be visible at your back throughout the bike ride.
sentences.chinese: 參赛号码布必须于整个单車赛段扣于背心后面。

sentences.english: Leg one is located in Hengxi County, about 20 km away from SV park.
sentences.chinese: 第一阶段的赛段位于横溪县，距离维修区约20公里。

sentences.english: The stages are aroud a reservoir, which goes through village and quarry.
sentences.chinese: 赛段环绕一座水库，经过村镇和采石场。

sentences.english: Leg two is located in Tangshan County, about 40 km away from SV park.
sentences.chinese: 第二阶段的赛段位于汤山县，距离维修区约40公里。

definition: time trial (e.g. in cycle race)/timed race/competition against the clock
race of several days/many day competition
Tour de France cycle race/abbr. for 環法自行車賽|环法自行车赛
ultramarathon/abbr. for 超級馬拉松|超级马拉松[chao1 ji2 ma3 la1 song1]
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
